values: Seeing and Savoring Jesus Christ, Session 2Seeing and Savoring Jesus Christ, Session 2

The beauty and attraction of Jesus Christ isn’t just that he is meek or just that he is strong, but that he is meek in his strength and strong in his meekness.The beauty and attraction of Jesus Christ isn’t just that he is meek or just that he is strong, but that he is meek in his strength and strong in his meekness.
